Description.val: The Defense Media Activity (DMA) Fiscal Year 2015 program of $11.640 million dollars continues to provide capital investment funds for a part of the multi-year initiative for automation of major equipment and systems used to execute the media and visual information and overseas radio and television information missions, and improved storage, management, and distribution of DoD imagery and visual information products.

Justification.val: The Defense Media Activity (DMA) Fiscal Year 2015 program of $11.640 will provide capital investment funds for a part of the multi-year initiative for automation of major equipment and systems used to execute the media and visual information, overseas radio and television information and joint training and education missions.
